lines.text: You've got my brand burned into your hide. Now remember that, Kitosch, and don't ever try to get away from here again or I give you my word, you'll dance the flamenco at the end of a rope.

[to Kitosch]
I'll shoot you in the stomach. That way you'll die real slow.

[to Kitosch]
Pig! My husband will hang you and I'll be sitting in the front row, watching the show.
